info: The project will rehabilitate about 1,000 kilometers (km) of rural roads in nine provinces (Kampong Cham, Kampong Thom, Kampong Chhnang, Pursat, Battambang, Kampong Speu, Siem Reap, Banteay Meanchey, and Takeo) to paved condition to provide a safer, cost-effective rural road network, with all-year access to markets and other social services. The project will also support a sustainable road maintenance regime in the Ministry of Rural Development (MRD), a community based road safety program, an HIV/AIDS and human trafficking prevention and awareness program, and climate change adaptaion measures.
name: RURAL ROADS IMPROVEMENT PROJECT II
